function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of proper ventilation in buildings can lead to airborne transmission of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreaks within the built environment.","Mitigation":"Implementing proper ventilation systems, air filters, and air purification technologies.","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, UVGI systems.","People":"Building occupants and visitors.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and public health authorities."},{"Description":"Poor sanitation and hygiene practices can facilitate the spread of contagious diseases within buildings.","Impact":"Higher probability of disease transmission and contamination of shared spaces.","Mitigation":"Enforcing strict sanitation protocols, promoting hand hygiene, and regular cleaning of surfaces.","Technologies":"Disinfection equipment, touchless fixtures, antimicrobial coatings.","People":"Building occupants, cleaning staff, and maintenance personnel.","Owner":"Building management, cleaning companies, and public health authorities."},{"Description":"Overcrowding and close proximity of individuals in buildings can contribute to rapid disease spread.","Impact":"Increased risk of close-contact transmission and higher likelihood of outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Limiting occupancy, promoting social distancing, and staggered use of communal spaces.","Technologies":"Occupancy monitoring systems, contactless access control, and space utilization analytics.","People":"Building occupants, event organizers, and facility managers.","Owner":"Building owners, event organizers, and facility management companies."}]}
